alert.note: Alert for Lee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 3:30PM EDT until April 06 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 329 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Desoto, or 13 miles west of Cordele, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chokee. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
